attributes.action: Put a stop to estate agents charging so much for credit and background checking when you try to rent a property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put a stop to the high cost of credit and background checking for rental properties via Estate Agents - costs £100.00 per person over the age of 18 - and makes it difficult (if not impossible) for lower income families to afford a decent rental property. Also to stop estate agents from making tentants pay for a further credit check when they want to move to another of their properties after a year. If a tenant has a good record for a full year of punctual payment of rent that should be enough.
